summary: NOT A MOD: Skyrim Books Checklist in PDF form. Contains all books* and where to find a copy of each book.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][b]Description[/b][/size]
If you are an avid book collector, then this is for you. A 30-page printable PDF file containing each obtainable book in Skyrim and its DLC along with their various locations. All credit goes to [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Books]http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Books[/url] and [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Books_(Skyrim)]http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Books_(Skyrim)[/url] for their comprehensive lists and locations of each book.

 
[size=6][b]Information[/b][/size]
Provided as-is, the PDF file contains three columns: a checkbox, book title in inventory, and location. It is broken down into two tables in alphabetical, chronological order: Books, Journals, Skill Books, Quest Books; Letters, Notes.
 
If you own the console version of games, this list is an alternative. *What this does not include is which book is a skill book or a quest book, or if they are from DLC. Books only available through console commands is omitted. Spell tomes and recipes are not included.
 
Time taken: 3 days, 48 hours to complete. Minimal proofreading.
 
[size=6][b]Issues[/b][/size]
[LIST]
[*]All information comes from the wiki platforms, so if there are any mistakes, please notify me. [/*]
[*]Some are blank because no location has been written on either wiki platform.[/*]
[*]Not enough bookshelf space in homes.[/*]
[*]Not all locations are listed.[/*]
[/LIST]
[size=6][b]Recommended[/b][/size]
[LIST]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51496]Reading List[/url][/b][/*]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23188/]Skyrim Books Checklist Spreadsheet[/url][/*]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2730]Headbomb's Better Sorting[/url][/*]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12553]Shawkab's Dovahkiin Hideout[/url][/*]
[/LIST]
author: floweringspriggan
